H0.text: Much in the news, who is the Director General of the BBC. Mark Thompson

H1.text: Much in the news, who is the Director General of the BBC. Helen Boaden

H2.text: Much in the news, who is the Director General of the BBC. Tony Hall

H3.text: Much in the news, who is the Director General of the BBC. George Entwistle

A4.text: The current director-general is Tim Davie, who succeeded Tony Hall on 1 September 2020.

A5.text: In November 2025, following the leaking of a report that alleged systemic bias within the BBC, Tim Davie resigned as Director-General
